Key Match Events: M. Mashaal scored a goal for Qatar in the 4th minute.
A. Ali scored a goal for Qatar in the 47th minute.
Y. Abdurisag scored a goal for Qatar in the 84th minute.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The over/under was 2.5 and the teams scored 3 goals, so people who bet the over won.
Qatar won at -153 odds so a bet of $153 won $253 total.
Others: Qatar made several substitutions during the game.
India also made several substitutions during the game.
